root.name: Kong: The 8th Wonder of the World
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by Ubisoft's Montreal studio for the Game Boy Advance, Kong: The 8th Wonder of the World is an isometric action RPG similar to the"Legend of Zelda" series that tasks the player with solving tricky puzzles, beating up dinosaurs, shooting natives and exploring dungeons.GameplayBearing a strong resemblance to the Legend of Zelda franchise, Kong: The 8th wonder of the World takes place from an isometric perspective and sees the player exploring an expansive overworld and trudging through dank, murky dungeons. As you explore these dungeons you will come across unique puzzles required to move on to the "dungeon boss".
